Because Hilary had to have a NY address to be Senator,
 She & Bill, both pretty broke already,
 bought a multi million dollar estate for themselves,
 at a monthly mortgage payment of $10,000.
 How will they pay for it, you ask?
 By requiring the Secret Service to build at taxpayer
 expense, a housing compound on the property for SS use,
 (thus vastly increasing the resale value of the estate)
 then CHARGING the Secret Service rent, you guessed it,
 at $10,000 a month in taxpayer dollars, for the privilege!
 Even when they're not in residence!
 As Mortgage interest and property taxes are tax
 deductable, They could stand to profit a huge amount by the
 tax benefit!
 Then pocketing Millions in profit when they sell the estate
 that the taxpayers bought for them!!
 So next time you see Hilary wagging her finger at
 government spending, know that she's scooping up free money
 from the taxpayers by the bucketload in the other hand!

So whats new?
 
 All politicians are greedy self serving hippocrites, why do you think they got into politics in the first place, i can tell you its not for the good of the people but for the good of their pocket.
 
 Whats the point of being in politics if you dont earn out of it?
